title: Third Time Charmed
description: Experience the magic of CHARMED Season 4 as you've only imagined! Join the third iteration of the Charmed Ones as they struggle with the loss of their sister and the implications of her untimely death, and continue their destined battle against the forces of evil. ğ…ğ«ğğ ğ­ğ¨ ğ«ğğšğ ğ¨ğ§ ğ–ğšğ­ğ­ğ©ğšğ, ğ‘ğ¨ğ²ğšğ¥ğ‘ğ¨ğšğ, ğˆğ§ğ¤ğ¢ğ­ğ­ ğšğ§ğ ğ¦ğ¨ğ«ğ.The Halliwell sisters' destiny has been rewritten, and the future as they know it has changed, more than they realize. After the tragic loss of their younger sister, Phoebe, Piper wants nothing more than to put her life as a witch behind her, while Prue is consumed with vengeance. However, when the Source of All Evil surfaces, they discover the existence of half-sister, Paige Matthews. As reluctant as they are to accept Paige, Prue and Piper must put aside their feelings to keep her safe and reconstitute the Power of Three. Only then, can they begin to uncover the truth about their sister's death and the larger mystery surrounding it.
author: T.J.   Smith
